paper_abstract: We regret that the article "On Fractional K-Factors of Random Graphs," which appeared in Random Structures and Algorithms (Haber and Krivelevich 30 (2007), 441-463), had an inaccuracy in Lemma 6. 1. This in turn led to a misstatement in the description of a family of graphs demonstrating the tightness of the main result. In this short note, we fix this inaccuracy and also take the opportunity. kindly provided by the editors, to close a gap in the proofs of two of the technical lemmas. We like to point the readers to http:/ /www.math.tau.ac.il/(similar to)krivelev/papers.html, where a corrected version of the article appears. (C) 2008 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Random Struct. Alg., 33, 533-535, 2008
paper_title: Corrigendum: On Fractional K-Factors of Random Graphs
